name: room escape:break doors&brain wars
description: Classic Room Escape: Escape from the mystery tower, and challenge the most creepy room escape game in history (official classic version). This will be another classic puzzle game of room escape type, the classic of classics in 2016. It is very challenging for gamers who should never miss it!The purpose of the game is to escape from so many rooms in mystery tower that makes you cannot stop thinking but just solve puzzles and find all hidden objects and finally enter the next layer successfully. It will test your intelligence (including abilities of observing, judging and computing) all the time. Let’s escape together.Humanized prompt function and smoothly pass levels without any costs. Enjoy yourself in this fun, addictive, free and popular intelligent game!Addictive little puzzles! Gorgeous images and various tower rooms with different theme! Continuously updated rooms!Don't miss for any room-escape gamelovers! Speed to try!
